Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Ama Qhuraan Nabiil cakkil kaa oobisne, usuk nummaay qadlil oobe, Nabiyow Nanu koo maruubinnino Yallih amri oggoltem jannatal aytikumusak hinnay kay amri cinteeh koroosittem giral meesiisak koo rubne nee akke waytek

Nabiyow Qhuraanak tuuy waqdi (falli) cakkii kee deedal ittak baxisuh kol oobisne kaa baxxaqisak, Sinaamal tuuy waqdi (falli) caalih kaak takriyemkeh, tuuy waqdi oobisiyyah kaak oobisne seehadâ tuxiqih elle faxxiima innal

Nabiyow! ama korosuk ixxic: isin ama Qhuraan nummaysa, hinnay kaa manummaysina, tokkel isin kaa nummassaanam tu kaat moosissaay isin kaa dirabbossaanam tu kaak (Qhuraan kinnuk) madaggossak, diggah kaak duma naharsi kitooba kah tontocowwime maray (yahuud kee nasaarâ tutaaxagok yeemene mara kinnuk) wacyi numma kinnim yeexege usuk (Qhuraan kinnuk) keenil yankirriyime waqdi Yallah kummaatak gomboh radan kaah Rammitak
ama maray ixxiga kah tontocowwime Qhuraan yaabbe waqdi Ni Rabbi koros kaa edde weelossu haytaamak saytunnooweh, Ni Rabbih xagni anguddubelem agaywaaga mali iyyan
ama mari foocitteh Yallah kummaatak gomboh Raddaah weeqaanah, Qhuraan yaabben waqdi, Qhuraan maabba Yallak meesii kee sorkocobbaxi satta keenih osissa

Nabiyow! ama korosuk ixxic: sin Rabbiy naba, Yallaw axcuk seecaay kallaca, hinnay Arracmaanow axcuk kaa seecaay kallaca, isin tama namma migaaqak kaa elle kallacitinnaan migaaqal kaa kallacita, toysa isin kallactaanam inki Rabbi kinnik toysa Yalli inkih meqe migaaqitte leemih sabbatah, Nabiyow isi salaatal Qhuraan takriye waqdi fayya kaa ma haysin koros koo taabbeeh Qhuraan xaaftaamak, Ramma kaa ma haysin ku kataysis kaa aabbe waytaamak, fayya kaa haytam kee Ramma kaa haytaamak fanaa fanah yan gita wagitak kaa akriy
Nabiyow Yallay baxa haysite weeh, Reedal agleyta sinniih, isi ginok awlaytuy xixxibaanek kaa cata sinnih fayla dabqis, dudda le kaxxa nabnah kaa eyneb qibaada kaah caglisak
Yallay dudda le fayla-le isi naqasu Nabii Mucammadal izza Qhuraan kitab oobiseeh cakkik makot tanim kee ittawway kay addal ma-hanna

Yalli ama kitab massah yan kitab kaa abe koros gibdi digaalay kay xaquk obtak edde meesiisamkeh, kaadu moominiiniy meqe taamoomi abbaasitta diggah meqe galto (jannat kinnuk) loonumul ken aytikumusamkeh
Usun Ama jannatih niqmatih addat umman waarak
Kaadu korosuy Yalli baxa haysite itte kaat meesiisamkeh
